StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [SP_CHECK_186]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
as
declare @ssn varchar(10), @date_ship varchar(8), @last_updt varchar(8), @con.rm char(1)
declare check_date cursor for
select SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER, substring(DATE_SHIP,2,8), LAST_UPDATE_DATE
from arms..ARMS186
open check_date
fetch check_date into @ssn, @date_ship,@last_updt
while(@@fetch_status = 0)
begin --.rst begin
exec SP_CHECK_DATE_8 @date_ship, @con.rm output if @con.rm = 'N' begin insert ERRORS_186 (SSN, LAST_UPDATE_DATE, ERROR_DATA, ERROR_TYPE) values (@ssn,@last_updt, @date_ship, 'Bad DATE_SHIP') end
fetch check_date into @ssn, @date_ship,@last_updt
end--all done
close check_date deallocate check_date
